title: Zdrzewno
text:
Zdrzewno () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Wicko">Gmina Wicko</a>, within <a href="L%C4%99bork%20County">Lębork County</a>, <a href="Pomeranian%20Voivodeship">Pomeranian Voivodeship</a>, in northern Poland. It lies approximately east of <a href="Wicko%2C%20Pomeranian%20Voivodeship">Wicko</a>, north of <a href="L%C4%99bork">Lębork</a>, and north-west of the regional capital <a href="Gda%C5%84sk">Gdańsk</a>.
For details of the history of the region, see "<a href="History%20of%20Pomerania">History of Pomerania</a>".
The village has a population of 225.
